refnamediv.refpurpose: Formats an SQL value and returns it as a generated XML fragment.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function formats an SQL value as an XML fragment and returns it. This is used internally by the SOAP server to encode the output parameter values and return values when processing a SOAP request.

refsect2.title: value
refsect2.para: Required. Any SQL value to be represented as an XML fragment.

refsect2.title: enclosing_tag
refsect2.para: Required. The XML tag to place the value into.

refsect2.title: date_encoding_type
refsect2.para:
Optional. Valid only if a value is a datetime. If supplied, the enclosing_tag
is ignored and the date is printed out in one of the following formats:

simplelist.member: 3 - Microsoft specific, recognized by some of the WebFolders clients

refsect2.title: soap_version
refsect2.para: Optional(Default 1). Valid only if the value type is not a datetime. The soap_version (1 for SOAP 1.0, 11 for SOAP 1.1).
